character.name: Dyna
description: Your demolition expert. She can set <c=parttrait>charges</c> that affect enemy parts when triggered.

description.Damage: Additionally hits parts up to {{Range}} spaces away for {{Damage}} damage.
description.StunDamage: Additionally hits parts up to {{Range}} spaces away for {{Damage}} damage, stunning them.
description.Stun: Additionally hits parts up to {{Range}} spaces away, stunning them.

description.Normal: Fire a <c=parttrait>charge</c> from your missile bay. The charge will stick to the enemy ship and trigger when shot upon or upon collision with another charge.
description.OffsetLeft: Fire a <c=parttrait>charge</c> {{Offset}} spaces to the left of your missile bay. The charge will stick to the enemy ship and trigger when shot upon or upon collision with another charge.
description.OffsetRight: Fire a <c=parttrait>charge</c> {{Offset}} spaces to the right of your missile bay. The charge will stick to the enemy ship and trigger when shot upon or upon collision with another charge.

TempNitro.name: Temp Nitro
TempNitro.description: The next triggered <c=action>Blastwave</c> deals {0} more damage.

Bastion.name: Bastion
Bastion.description: Whenever you trigger a <c=parttrait>charge</c>, gain {0} <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c>, converting as much as possible to <c=status>SHIELD</c>.

Concussion.name: Concussion Charge
Concussion.description: Makes the ship part <c=parttrait>concussable</c> when triggered.

Demo.name: Demo Charge
Demo.description: Makes the ship part <c=parttrait>weak</c> when triggered.

Flux.name: Flux Charge
Flux.description: Makes the ship part <c=parttrait>flux</c> when triggered.

Shatter.name: Shatter Charge
Shatter.description: Makes the ship part <c=parttrait>brittle</c> when triggered.

Flux.name: Flux
Flux.description: The opposing ship gains 1 <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c> when this part gets hit.

m&k: This card has three separate sets of actions.
In combat, <c=keyword>right click or ctrl-click</c> this card to switch between them.
controller: This card has three separate sets of actions.
In combat, press {{Button}} on this card to switch between them.

BlastPowder.name: BLAST POWDER
BlastPowder.description: Non-<c=action>Blastwave attacks</c> deal +1 damage whenever they directly hit a <c=parttrait>charge</c>.

BlownFuse.name: BLOWN FUSE
BlownFuse.description: Gain 1 extra <c=energy>ENERGY</c> every turn. <c=downside><c=parttrait>Charges</c> that haven't been triggered are removed at the end of your enemy's turn.</c>

Firecracker.name: FIRECRACKER
Firecracker.description: Every 4th time you fire a <c=parttrait>charge</c>, gain 1 <c=status>TEMP NITRO</c>.

Gelignite.name: GELIGNITE
Gelignite.description: Each combat, stick a <c=parttrait>Burst Charge</c> to a random enemy ship's part.

HardHat.name: HARD HAT
HardHat.description: If you end your turn with <c=status>LESS ENERGY NEXT TURN</c>, gain 2 <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c>.

UnstableCompound.name: UNSTABLE COMPOUND
UnstableCompound.description: All <c=action>Blastwave</c> attacks are <c=action>Wide Blastwave</c>. <c=downside>Whenever you trigger <c=action>Blastwave</c>, take 1 damage.</c>

DynaBooks.name: PHOENIX FEATHER
DynaBooks.description: At the end of your turn, spend 3 <c=status>SHARD</c> to gain 1 <c=status>NITRO</c>.

DynaCat.name: BLAST PROCESSOR
DynaCat.description: <c=card>Basic Shot</c> cards now have <c=action>Blastwave 1</c>. Upon pickup, add two <c=card>Basic Shot</c>s to your deck.

DynaDizzy.name: BLAST GOGGLES
DynaDizzy.description: At the start of combat, add a <c=cardtrait>temporary</c> <c=card>Flux Charge B</c> with <c=cardtrait>Exhaust</c> to your hand. <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c> gained from hitting a part with <c=parttrait>Flux</c> is converted into <c=status>SHIELD</c> if possible.

DynaEddie.name: BLUE WIRE
DynaEddie.description: The first time you would gain <c=status>LESS ENERGY NEXT TURN</c> each combat, gain 1 <c=status>ENERGY NEXT TURN</c> instead.

DynaIsaac.name: BAZOOKA MOD
DynaIsaac.description: Shots from <c=midrow>Attack Drones</c> now have <c=action>Blastwave 0</c>. <c=status>NITRO</c> and <c=status>TEMP NITRO</c> affect their <c=action>Blastwave</c> damage.

DynaMax.name: VIRUS BOMB
DynaMax.description: Every 5th time you <c=cardtrait>exhaust</c> a card, fire a 0 damage shot with <c=action>Stunwave</c>.

DynaPeri.name: FISSION CHARGE
DynaPeri.description: When <c=parttrait>charges</c> are triggered, enemies take damage equal to your <c=status>OVERDRIVE</c> and lose hull equal to your <c=status>POWERDRIVE</c>.

DynaRiggs.name: MODEL ROCKET
DynaRiggs.description: The first time you would gain <c=status>LESS ENERGY NEXT TURN</c> each combat, fire a <c=parttrait>Swift Charge</c>.

DynaSoggins.name: DUD BOMB
DynaSoggins.description: The first time you <c=downside>botch</c> a card each turn, fire either a <c=parttrait>Concussion or Shatter Charge</c> at random.

description.None: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=EC592B>Dyna</c> cards to your hand.
description.A: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=EC592B>Dyna</c> cards to your hand.
description.B: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=EC592B>Dyna</c> cards to your hand.

description.None: Add two <c=card>Custom Charge</c>s to your hand. Gain 1 <c=status>evade</c>.
description.A: Add two <c=card>Custom Charge A</c>s to your hand. Gain 1 <c=status>evade</c>.
description.B: Add two <c=card>Custom Charge</c>s to your hand. Gain 2 <c=status>evade</c>.

RemoteDetonator.name: Remote Detonator
RemoteDetonator.description: Trigger all <c=parttrait>charges</c>, deal {{Damage}} hull damage for each.
